title: Personal finance advice doesn't work for most Americans, economists say
description: Personal finance is too complex for most people to navigate, two economists contend in a new book. Is there a better way to help people deal with money?
content: Americans typically score poorly in financial literacy tests. Yet they're on their own when it comes to making major financial decisions, from funding their retirement to buying a home, two economist… [+8450 chars]
